channel.title: Intros on wasta [Linux]
channel.description: Recent content in Intros on wasta [Linux]

item.title: Intro to Files app
item.description: Introduction to Files app Browse and manage computer files and folders Your browser does not support the video element. Other Features Special actions for certain file types in the right-click menu. Connect to network drives.

item.title: Intro to Software Manager
item.description: Introduction to Software Manager App installation Your browser does not support the video element. App Removal Your browser does not support the video element.

item.title: Intro to System Monitor
item.description: Introduction to System Monitor Basic Usage See running processes. See live memory, CPU, and network usage. See file system status. Your browser does not support the video element. Other Features Stop a misbehaving process. Filter output using the search field. Change visible columns.
